name.baseName: 热处理|热处理件|结构材料：金属工件、工艺材料：气体渗碳、渗氮、碳氮共渗介质|气体渗氮/渗碳/碳氮共渗|所有规模

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的工业过程涉及结构应用金属工件的热处理工艺，使用气体渗碳、渗氮和碳氮共渗介质。这些处理适用于各种大小的金属部件，通常用于制造需要提高耐磨性、韧性或疲劳强度的组件。末端处理技术如热燃烧、再生催化燃烧、直接燃烧、吸附/热燃烧、吸附/催化燃烧、低温等离子体、光催化和直接排放被用来处理工业废气中的污染物，如挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）和氨气。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码33-37文件，在完整版文件中第991页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisCatalytic combustion method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是催化燃烧法，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisDirect combustion，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是直接燃烧法，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisRegenerative catalytic combustion method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1

污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是吸附/催化燃烧法，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisOthers (adsorption)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management60，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是其他（吸附法），其效率为60，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisLow temperature plasma，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management30，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
污染物指标挥发性有机物的末端治理技术是低温等离子体，其效率为30，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量（千瓦时）/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率（千瓦）×工艺废气净化装置运行时间（小时）)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
